/*
Return a greatest common divisor of two integers a and b
>>> greater_common_divisors(3, 5)
1
>>> greater_common_divisors(25, 15)
5
*/
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int greater_common_divisors(int a, int b){
    int r = a;
    while(b!= 0){
        r = b;
        b = r%b;
    }
    return r;
}
